h4.p: [03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chakkanipātassa ^a^V3.0077^ea^^a^M3.0081^ea^ paṭhame ^b^cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti nissayavohārena vuttaṃ. Sasambhārakaniddesoyaṃ yathā ‘‘dhanunā vijjhatī’’ti, tasmā nissayasīsena nissitassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāyamattho ‘‘cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena disvā’’ti. ^b^Neva sumano hotī^eb^ti javanakkhaṇe iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rāgaṃ anuppādento neva sumano hoti gehassitapemavasenapi maggena sabbaso rāgassa samucchinnattā. ^b^Na dummano^eb^ti aniṭṭhe adussanto na dummano. Pasādaññathattavasenapi iṭṭhepi aniṭṭhepi majjhattepi ārammaṇe na samaṃ sammā ayoniso gahaṇaṃ ^b^asamapekkhanaṃ^eb^. Ayañcassa paṭipatti sativepullappattiyā paññāvepullappattiyā ^a^V3.0078^ea^ cāti āha ^b^‘‘sato sampajāno hutvā’’^eb^ti. Satiyā yuttattā ^b^sato^eb^. Sampajaññena yuttattā ^b^sampajāno^eb^. Ñāṇuppattipaccayarahitakālepi pavattibhedanato ^b^‘‘satatavihāro kathito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Satatavihāro^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa niccavihāro sabbadā pavattanakavihāro. Ṭhapetvā hi samāpattivelaṃ bhavaṅgavelañca khīṇāsavā imināva chaḷaṅgupekkhāvihārena viharanti.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘chasu dvāresupi upekkhako viharatī’’ti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā. ‘‘Sampajāno’’ti vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato. Satatavihārabhāvato aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni labbhanti. ‘‘Neva sumano na dummano’’ti vacanato aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni, hasituppādo, voṭṭhabbanañcāti dasa cittāni labbhanti. Rāgadosasahajātānaṃ somanassadomanassānaṃ abhāvo tesampi sādhāraṇoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti ce? Āsevanato. Kiñcāpi ^a^M3.0082^ea^ khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato, kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tassa yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ pubbāsevanavasena somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva.
[06]Paṭhamāahuneyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^2-7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye (visuddhi. 2.380) ^b^anekavihita^eb^nti anekavidhaṃ nānappakāraṃ. ^b^Iddhividha^eb^nti iddhikoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^Paccanubhotī^eb^ti paccanubhavati, phusati sacchikaroti pāpuṇātīti attho. Idānissa anekavihitabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘ekopi hutvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ‘‘ekopi hutvā’’ti iminā karaṇato pubbeva pakatiyā ekopi hutvā. ^b^Bahudhā hotī^eb^ti bahūnaṃ santike caṅkamitukāmo vā sajjhāyaṃ kātukāmo vā pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo vā hutvā satampi sahassampi hoti. ^b^Āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāva^eb^nti ettha āvibhāvaṃ karoti, tirobhāvaṃ karotīti ayamattho. Idameva hi sandhāya ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 3.11) vuttaṃ – ‘‘āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvuṭaṃ hoti appaṭicchannaṃ vivaṭaṃ, tirobhāvanti kenaci āvuṭaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ pihitaṃ paṭikujjita’’nti. ^b^Tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse^eb^ti ettha ^b^tirokuṭṭa^eb^nti parakuṭṭaṃ, kuṭṭassa parabhāganti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo itaresu. ^b^Kuṭṭo^eb^ti ca gehabhittiyā ^a^V3.0079^ea^ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Pākāro^eb^ti gehavihāragāmādīnaṃ parikkhepapākāro. ^b^Pabbato^eb^ti paṃsupabbato vā pāsāṇapabbato vā. ^b^Asajjamāno^eb^ti alaggamāno seyyathāpi ākāse viya.

[03]^b^Ummujjanimujja^eb^nti ettha ^b^ummujja^eb^nti uṭṭhānaṃ vuccati. ^b^Nimujja^eb^nti saṃsīdanaṃ. Ummujjañca nimujjañca ^b^ummujjanimujjaṃ. Udakepi abhijjamāne^eb^ti ettha yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā saṃsīdati, taṃ bhijjamānanti vuccati, viparītaṃ ^b^abhijjamānaṃ. Pallaṅkena^eb^ gacchati. ^b^Pakkhī^eb^^a^M3.0083^ea^^b^sakuṇo^eb^ti pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo. ^b^Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasatī^eb^ti ettha candimasūriyānaṃ dvācattālīsayojanasahassassa upari caraṇena mahiddhikatā, tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā. Evaṃ uparicaraṇāalokakaraṇehi mahiddhike mahānubhāve. ^b^Parāmasatī^eb^ti gaṇhāti, ekadese vā chupati. ^b^Parimajjatī^eb^ti samantato ādāsatalā viya parimajjati. ^b^Yāva brahmalokāpī^eb^ti brahmalokampi paricchedaṃ katvā. ^b^Kāyena vasaṃ vattetī^eb^ti tatra brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṃ vatteti.

[03]^b^Dibbāya sotadhātuyā^eb^ti ettha dibbasadisattā ^b^dibbā^eb^. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattā pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhā upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthā dibbā pasādasotadhātu hoti. Ayañcāpi imassa bhikkhuno vīriyabhāvanābalena nibbattā ñāṇasotadhātu tādisāyevāti dibbasadisattā dibbā. Apica dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi ^b^dibbā^eb^. Savanaṭṭhena nijjīvaṭṭhena ca sotadhātu. Sotadhātukiccakaraṇena sotadhātu viyātipi sotadhātu. Tāya ^b^sotadhātuyā. Visuddhāyā^eb^ti suddhāya nirupakkilesāya. ^b^Atikkantamānusikāyā^eb^ti manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddasavane mānusikaṃ maṃsasotadhātuṃ atikkantāya vītivattetvā ṭhitāya. ^b^Ubho sadde suṇātī^eb^ti dve sadde suṇāti. Katame dve? ^b^Dibbe ca mānuse ca,^eb^ devānañca manussānañca saddeti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena padesapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ye dūre santike cā^eb^ti ye saddā dūre paracakkavāḷepi, ye ca santike antamaso sadehasannissitapāṇakasaddāpi, te suṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena nippadesapariyādānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Parasattāna^eb^nti attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattānaṃ. ^b^Parapuggalāna^eb^nti idampi iminā ekatthameva. Veneyyavasena pana desanāvilāsena ca byañjananānattaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Cetasā ceto^eb^ti attano cittena tesaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^Pariccā^eb^ti paricchinditvā. ^b^Pajānātī^eb^ti sarāgādivasena nānappakārato jānāti. ^b^Sarāgaṃ vā citta^eb^ntiādīsu pana aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti veditabbaṃ. Avasesaṃ cātubhūmakaṃ ^a^V3.0080^ea^ kusalābyākatacittaṃ ^b^vītarāgaṃ^eb^. Dve ^a^M3.0084^ea^ domanassacittāni, dve vicikicchuddhaccacittānīti imāni pana cattāri cittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti. Keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhanti. Duvidhaṃ pana domanassacittaṃ ^b^sadosaṃ cittaṃ^eb^ nāma. Sabbampi cātubhūmakaṃ kusalābyākatacittaṃ ^b^vītadosaṃ^eb^. Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti. Keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhanti. ^b^Samohaṃ vītamoha^eb^nti ettha pana pāṭipuggalikanayena vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayameva samohaṃ. Mohassa pana sabbākusalesu sambhavato dvādasavidhampi akusalacittaṃ ^b^samohaṃ citta^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. Avasesaṃ ^b^vītamohaṃ^eb^. Thinamiddhānugataṃ pana ^b^saṃkhittaṃ,^eb^ uddhaccānugataṃ ^b^vikkhittaṃ^eb^. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ ^b^mahaggataṃ,^eb^ avasesaṃ ^b^amahaggataṃ^eb^. Sabbampi tebhūmakaṃ ^b^sauttaraṃ,^eb^ lokuttaraṃ ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^. Upacārappattaṃ appanāppattañca ^b^samāhitaṃ,^eb^ ubhayamappattaṃ ^b^asamāhitaṃ^eb^. Tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedappaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavimuttiṃ pattaṃ pañcavidhampi etaṃ ^b^vimuttaṃ,^eb^ vimuttimappattaṃ vā ^b^avimutta^eb^nti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Anekavihita^eb^nti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.12) anekavidhaṃ, anekehi vā pakārehi pavattitaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti attho. ^b^Pubbenivāsa^eb^nti samanantarātītabhavaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha tattha nivutthasantānaṃ. ^b^Anussaratī^eb^ti khandhapaṭipāṭivasena, cutipaṭisandhivasena vā anugantvā anugantvā sarati. Seyyathidaṃ – ^b^ekampi jātiṃ…pe… pubbenivāsaṃ anussaratī^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^ekampi jāti^eb^nti ekampi paṭisandhimūlaṃ cutipariyosānaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ khandhasantānaṃ. Esa nayo ^b^dvepi jātiyo^eb^tiādīsupi. ^b^Anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe^eb^tiādīsu pana parihāyamāno kappo ^b^saṃvaṭṭakappo,^eb^ vaḍḍhamāno ^b^vivaṭṭakappo^eb^ti veditabbo. Tattha saṃvaṭṭena saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī gahito hoti taṃmūlakattā, vivaṭṭena vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Evañhi sati yāni tāni ‘‘cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī’’ti (a. ni. 4.156) vuttāni, tāni pariggahitāni honti.

[03]^b^Amutrāsi^eb^nti amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe ahaṃ amumhi bhave vā yoniyā vā gahiyā vā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā sattanikāye vā āsiṃ. ^b^Evaṃnāmo^eb^ti tisso vā phusso vā. ^b^Evaṃgotto^eb^ti gotamo vā kaccāyano vā kassapo vā. Idamassa atītabhave attano nāmagottānussaraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Sace pana tasmiṃ kāle attano vaṇṇasampattilūkhapaṇītajīvikabhāvaṃ ^a^M3.0085^ea^ sukhadukkhabahulataṃ appāyukadīghāyukabhāvaṃ vā anussaritukāmo hoti, tampi anussaratiyeva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃvaṇṇo…pe… evamāyupariyanto’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^evaṃvaṇṇo^eb^ti odāto vā sāmo vā. ^b^Evamāhāro^eb^ti sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā pavattaphalabhojano vā. ^b^Evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0081^ea^ anena pakārena kāyikacetasikānaṃ sāmisanirāmisādippabhedānaṃ sukhadukkhānaṃ paṭisaṃvedī. ^b^Evamāyupariyanto^eb^ti evaṃ vassasataparimāṇāyupariyanto vā caturāsītikappasahassāyupariyanto vā. ^b^So tato cuto amutra udapādi^eb^nti so ahaṃ tato bhavato yonito gahito viññāṇaṭṭhitito sattāvāsato sattanikāyato vā cuto punāmukasmiṃ nāma bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sakkanikāye vā udapādiṃ. ^b^Tatrāpāsi^eb^nti tatrāpi bhave yoniyā gatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā sattāvāse sattanikāye vā puna ahosiṃ. ^b^Evaṃnāmo^eb^tiādi vuttanayameva.

[03]Apica ^b^amutrāsi^eb^nti idaṃ anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ. ^b^So tato^eb^ti paṭinivattantassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘idhūpapanno’’^eb^ti imissā idhūpapattiyā anantarameva uppattiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya ‘‘amutra udapādi’’nti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tatrāpāsi^eb^nti evamādi panassa tatrāpi imissā upapattiyā antare upapattiṭṭhāne nāmagottādīnaṃ anussaraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^So tato cuto idhūpapanno^eb^ti svāhaṃ tato anantaruppattiṭṭhānato cuto idha amukasmiṃ nāma khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattoti. ^b^Itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^Sākāraṃ sauddesa^eb^nti nāmagottavasena sauddesaṃ, vaṇṇādivasena sākāraṃ. Nāmagottena hi satto ‘‘tisso kassapo’’ti uddisīyati, vaṇṇādīhi ‘‘sāmo odāto’’ti nānattato paññāyati, tasmā nāmagottaṃ uddeso, itare ākārā.

[03]^b^Dibbenā^eb^tiādīsu dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Devatānañhi sucaritakammanibbattaṃ pittasemharuhirādīhi apalibuddhaṃ upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalena nibbattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā attano ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ. Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi ^a^M3.0086^ea^ dibbaṃ. Tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena mahāgatikattāpi ^b^dibbaṃ^eb^. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena cakkhu. Cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhu. Cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddhaṃ. Yo hi cutimeva passati, na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo upapātameva passati, na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati, tasmā taṃ dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti. Ubhayampi cetaṃ buddhaputtā passanti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā visuddha’’nti. Manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ, mānusaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā ^a^V3.0082^ea^ atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ. Tena ^b^dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena^eb^.

[03]^b^Satte passatī^eb^ti manussānaṃ maṃsacakkhunā viya satte oloketi. ^b^Cavamāne upapajjamāne^eb^ti ettha cutikkhaṇe vā upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā. Ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti, te cavamānāti, ye ca gahitappaṭisandhikā sampatinibbattā ca, te upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne ca passatīti dasseti. ^b^Hīne^eb^ti mohanissandayuttattā hīnānaṃ jātikulabhogādīnaṃ vasena hīḷite uññāte. ^b^Paṇīte^eb^ti amohanissandayuttattā tabbiparīte. ^b^Suvaṇṇe^eb^ti adosanissandayuttattā iṭṭhakantamanāpavaṇṇayutte. ^b^Dubbaṇṇe^eb^ti dosanissandayuttattā aniṭṭhākantāmanāpavaṇṇayutte, virūpavirūpetipi attho. ^b^Sugate^eb^ti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane. ^b^Duggate^eb^ti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne.

[03]^b^Yathākammūpage^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena upagate. ^b^Kāyaduccaritenā^eb^tiādīsu duṭṭhu caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ. Kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti ^b^kāyaduccaritaṃ^eb^. Itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^Samannāgatā^eb^ti samaṅgibhūtā. ^b^Ariyānaṃ upavādakā^eb^ti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi anatthakāmā hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā, akkosakā garahakāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Micchādiṭṭhikā^eb^ti viparītadassanā ^a^M3.0087^ea^. ^b^Micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhivasena samādinnanānāvidhakammā, yepi micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādāpenti.

[03]^b^Kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. ^b^Paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇā. Atha vā ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti jīvitindriyassūpacchedā. ^b^Paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti cuticittato uddhaṃ. ^b^Apāya^eb^nti evamādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanameva. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā ^b^apāyo^eb^. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti ^b^duggati,^eb^ dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammena nibbattā gatīti ^b^duggati^eb^. Vivasā nipatanti tattha dukkaṭṭakārinoti ^b^vinipāto,^eb^ vinassantā vā ettha patanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgāti ^b^vinipāto^eb^. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti ^b^nirayo^eb^.

[03]Atha vā ^b^apāya^eb^ggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti. Tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā ^a^V3.0083^ea^, na duggati mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. ^b^Duggati^eb^ggahaṇena pettivisayañca. So hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sugatito apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā, na tu vinipāto asurasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. ^b^Vinipāta^eb^ggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ. So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi vinipatitattā vinipātoti vuccati. ^b^Niraya^eb^ggahaṇena avīciādikamanekappakāraṃ nirayamevāti. ^b^Upapannā^eb^ti upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo. Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha ^b^sugati^eb^ggahaṇena manussāgatipi saṅgayhati, ^b^sagga^eb^ggahaṇena devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti ^b^sugati^eb^. Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti ^b^saggo^eb^. So sabbopi lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana sabbākārena ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāto^eb^ gahetabbo. Tatiyādīni uttānatthāni.
[06]Dutiyāahuneyyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0088^ea^ natthi etesaṃ uttarāni visiṭṭhānīti anuttarāni, anuttarāni eva ^b^anuttariyāni^eb^ yathā ‘‘anantameva anantariya’’nti āha ^b^‘‘niruttarānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dassanānuttariyaṃ nāma^eb^ phalavisesāvahattā. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Sattavidhāriyadhanalābho^eb^ti sattavidhasaddhādilokuttaradhanalābho. ^b^Sikkhāttayassa pūraṇa^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ pūraṇaṃ. Tattha pūraṇaṃ nippariyāyato asekkhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya hi satta sekhā tisso sikkhā pūrenti nāma, arahā paripuṇṇasikkhoti. Iti imāni anuttariyāni lokiyalokuttarāni kathitāni.
[06]Anuttariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānānīti ^b^anussatiṭṭhānāni. Buddhaguṇārammaṇā satī^eb^ti yathā buddhānussati visesādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ hoti, evaṃ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā buddhaguṇe ārabbhe uppannā sati. Evaṃ anussarato ^a^V3.0084^ea^ hi pīti uppajjati, so taṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Upacārakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāmetaṃ gihīnampi labbhati. ^b^Upacārakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ca paccakkhato upacārajjhānāvahaṃ kammaṭṭhānaparamparāya sammasanaṃ yāva arahattā lokiyalokuttaravisesāvahaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha.
[06]Anussatiṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti buddhāguṇānussaraṇasamaye. ^b^Rāgapariyuṭṭhita^eb^nti rāgena pariyuṭṭhitaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhānappattipi, rāgena vā saṃhitaṃ cittaṃ ^a^M3.0089^ea^ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvatopi pariyuṭṭhitarāganti attho. Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘uppajjamānena rāgena uṭṭhahitvā gahita’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Ujukamevā^eb^ti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ apanītattā cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṃ mānādīnaṃ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā oṇatiuṇṇativirahato ujubhāvameva gataṃ. Atha vā ^b^ujukamevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānassa thinaṃ middhaṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamato majjhimasamathanimittappaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti bhavajātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ nissāya. ^b^Atthaveda^eb^nti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha. ^b^Dhammaveda^eb^nti hetuṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ. ‘‘Ārakattā araha’’nti anussarantassa hi yadidaṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu. Ñāpako cettha hetu adhippeto, na kārako sampāpako. Tatonena ñāyamāno arahattattho phalaṃ. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi hetuso phalavipāko veditabbo. ^b^Dhammānussati^eb^ādīsupi hi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇatādayo suppaṭipattiādayo ca tattha tattha hetubhāvena niddiṭṭhāyeva. ^b^Dhammūpasaṃhita^eb^nti yathāvuttahetuphalasaṅkhātaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ.
[06]Mahānāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Āhuneyyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa ^a^V3.0085^ea^ paṭhame ^b^saritabbayuttakā^eb^ti anussaraṇārahā. Mijjati siniyhati etāyāti mettā, mittabhāvo. Mettā etassa atthīti ^b^mettaṃ,^eb^ kāyakammaṃ. Taṃ pana yasmā mettāsahagatacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mettena cittena kātabbaṃ kāyakamma’’^eb^nti. Esa nayo sesadvayepi. ^b^Imānī^eb^ti mettakāyakammādīni. ^b^Bhikkhūnaṃ vasena āgatāni^eb^ tesaṃ seṭṭhaparisabhāvato. Yathā pana bhikkhunīsupi labbhanti, evaṃ gihīsupi labbhanti catuparisasādhāraṇattāti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhikkhūnañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Bhikkhuno ^a^M3.0090^ea^ sabbampi anavajjakāyakammaṃ ābhisamācārikakammantogadhamevāti āha ^b^‘‘mettena cittena…pe… kāyakammaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti. Bhattivasena pavattiyamānā cetiyabodhīnaṃ vandanā mettāsiddhāti katvā tadatthāya gamanaṃ ‘‘mettaṃ kāyakamma’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena cetiyabodhibhikkhūsu vuttāvasesāpacāyanādivasena pavattamettāvasena pavattaṃ kāyikaṃ kiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ^eb^ kathiyamānanti adhippāyo. Tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ paripucchanātthakathanavasena pavattiyamānameva ^b^mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma^eb^ hitajjhāsayena pavattitabbato. ^b^Tīṇi sucaritānī^eb^ti kāyavacīmanosucaritāni. ^b^Cintana^eb^nti evaṃ cintanamattampi manokammaṃ, pageva paṭipannā bhāvanāti dasseti.

[03]^b^Āvī^eb^ti pakāsaṃ. Pakāsabhāvo cettha yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa sammukhabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘sammukhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Raho^eb^ti appakāsaṃ. Appakāsatā ca yaṃ uddissa taṃ kāyakammaṃ karīyati, tassa apaccakkhabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘parammukhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ purato. Tesu karontesuyeva hi sahāyabhāvagamanaṃ sammukhā kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^Ubhayehī^eb^ti navakehi therehi ca. ^b^Paggayhā^eb^ti paggaṇhitvā uddhaṃ katvā kevalaṃ ‘‘devo’’ti avatvā guṇehi thirabhāvajotanaṃ ‘‘devatthero’’ti vacanaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ. Mamattabodhanaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^mamāyanavacanaṃ^eb^. Ekantaparammukhassa manokammassa sammukhatā nāma viññattisamuṭṭhāpanavasena hoti, tañca kho loke kāyakammanti pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ. Hatthavikārādīni anāmasitvā eva dassento ^b^‘‘nayanāni ummīletvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kāmaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhānaṃ nayanānaṃ ummīlanā pasannena mukhena olokanañca ^a^V3.0086^ea^ mettaṃ kāyakammameva, yassa pana cittassa vasena nayanānaṃ mettāsinehasiniddhatā mukhassa ca pasannatā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mettaṃ manokammaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Lābha^eb^-saddo kammasādhano ‘‘lābhā vata, bho, laddho’’tiādīsu viya. So cettha ‘‘dhammaladdhā’’ti vacanato atītakālikoti āha ^b^‘‘cīvarādayo laddhapaccayā’’^eb^ti. Dhammato āgatāti ^b^dhammikā,^eb^ parisuddhagamanā paccayā. Tenāha ‘‘dhammaladdhā’’ti. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kuhanādī’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M3.0091^ea^ vuttaṃ. Na sammā gayhamānā hi dhammaladdhā nāma na hontīti tappaṭisedhanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘dhammaladdhā’’ti vuttaṃ. Deyyaṃ dakkhiṇeyyañca appaṭivibhattaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti ^b^appaṭivibhattabhogī^eb^ nāma hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dve paṭivibhattāni nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cittena vibhajana^eb^nti etena cittuppādamattenapi vibhajanaṃ paṭivibhattaṃ nāma, pageva payogatoti dasseti. Cittena vibhajanapubbakaṃ vā kāyena vibhajananti mūlameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ cittena vibhajana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tena cittuppādamattena paṭivibhāgo kātabboti dasseti. ^b^Appaṭivibhatta^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, appaṭivibhattaṃ lābhaṃ bhuñjatīti kammaniddeso vā. ^b^Taṃ neva gihīnaṃ deti^eb^ attano ājīvasodhanatthaṃ. ^b^Na attanā paribhuñjati^eb^ ‘‘mayhaṃ asādhāraṇabhogitā mā hotū’’ti. ^b^Paṭiggaṇhanto ca…pe… passatī^eb^ti iminā āgamanato paṭṭhāya sādhāraṇabuddhiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ hissa sādhāraṇabhogitā sukarā, sāraṇīyadhammo cassa pūro hoti.

[03]Atha vā ^b^paṭiggaṇhanto ca…pe… passatī^eb^ti iminā tassa lābhassa tīsu kālesu sādhāraṇato ṭhapanaṃ dassitaṃ. ^b^Paṭiggaṇhanto ca saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotū^eb^ti iminā paṭiggahaṇakālo dassito. ^b^Gahetvā…pe… passatī^eb^ti iminā paṭiggahitakālo. Tadubhayaṃ pana tādisena pubbabhāgena vinā na hotīti atthasiddho purimakālo. Tayidaṃ paṭiggahaṇato pubbevassa hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhissāmī’’ti, paṭiggaṇhantassa hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti paṭiggaṇhāmī’’ti, paṭiggahetvā hoti ‘‘saṅghena sādhāraṇaṃ hotūti hi paṭiggahitaṃ mayā’’ti. Evaṃ tilakkhaṇasampannaṃ katvā laddhaṃ lābhaṃ osāraṇalakkhaṇaṃ avikopetvā paribhuñjanto sādhāraṇabhogī appaṭivibhattabhogī ca hoti.

[03]^b^Imaṃ pana sāraṇīyadhamma^eb^nti imaṃ catutthaṃ saritabbayuttadhamaṃ. ^b^Na hi…pe… gaṇhanti,^eb^ tasmā sādhāraṇabhogitā dussīlassa natthīti ārambhopi tāva na sambhavati, kuto pūraṇanti adhippāyo. ^b^Parisuddhasīlo^eb^ti iminā lābhassa dhammikabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Vattaṃ akhaṇḍento^eb^ti iminā appaṭivibhattabhogitaṃ sādhāraṇabhogitañca dasseti. Sati pana tadubhaye sāraṇīyadhammo pūrito eva ^a^V3.0087^ea^ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘pūretī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Odissakaṃ katvā^eb^ti etena anodissakaṃ katvā pituno, ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ vā ^a^M3.0092^ea^ therāsanato paṭṭhāya dentassa sāraṇīyadhammoyeva hotīti dasseti. ^b^Dātabba^eb^nti avassaṃ dātabbaṃ. ^b^Sāraṇīyadhammo panassa na hoti^eb^ paṭijaggaṭṭhāne odissakaṃ katvā dinnattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘palibodhajagganaṃ nāma hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Muttapalibodhassa vaṭṭati^eb^ amuttapalibodhassa pūretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Yadi evaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ pūrentassa odissakadānaṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? No na vaṭṭati yuttaṭṭhāneti dassento ^b^‘‘tena panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Iminā odissakadānaṃ panassa na sabbattha vāritanti dasseti. Gilānādīnañhi odissakaṃ katvā dānaṃ appaṭivibhāgapakkhikaṃ ‘‘asukassa na dassāmī’’ti paṭikkhepassa abhāvato. Byatirekappadhāno hi paṭibhāgo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avasesa’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Adātumpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena dātumpi vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Tañca kho karuṇāyanavasena, na vattaparipūraṇavasena, tasmā dussīlassapi atthikassa sati sambhave dātabbaṃ. Dānañhi nāma na kassaci nivāritaṃ.

[03]^b^Susikkhitāyā^eb^ti sāraṇīyapūraṇavidhimhi susikkhitāya, sukusalāyāti attho. Idāni tassa kosallaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘susikkhitāya hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvādasahi vassehi pūrehi, na tato ora^eb^nti iminā tassa duppūrataṃ dasseti. Tathā hi so mahapphalo mahānisaṃso diṭṭhadhammikehipi tāvagarutarehi phalānisaṃsehi anugatoti taṃsamaṅgī ca puggalo visesalābhī ariyapuggalo viya loke acchariyabbhutadhammasamannāgato hoti. Tathā hi so duppajahadānamayassa sīlamayassa puññassa paṭipakkhadhammaṃ sudūre vikkhambhitaṃ katvā visuddhena cetasā loke pākaṭo paññāto hutvā viharati. Tassimamatthaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]Idānissa samparāyike diṭṭhadhammike ca ānisaṃse dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ pūritasāraṇīyadhammassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Neva issā na macchariyaṃ hoti^eb^ cirakālabhāvanāya vidhutabhāvato. ^b^Manussānaṃ piyo hoti^eb^ pariccāgasīlatāya vissutattā. Tenāha ‘‘dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū’’tiādi (a. ni. 5.34). ^b^Sulabhapaccayo hoti^eb^ dānavasena uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ paccayalābhassa idhānisaṃsasabhāvato dānassa. ^b^Pattagatamassa diyyamānaṃ ^a^M3.0093^ea^ na khīyati^eb^ pattagatasseva dvādasavassikassa mahāvattassa avicchedena pūritattā. ^b^Aggabhaṇḍaṃ labhati^eb^ devasikaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggato paṭṭhāya dānassa dinnattā. ^b^Bhaye vā…pe… āpajjanti^eb^ deyyappaṭiggāhakavikappaṃ akatvā attani nirapekkhacittena cirakālaṃ dānassa pūritatāya pasāritacittattā.

[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0088^ea^ tesu ānisaṃsesu vibhāvetabbesu. ^b^Imāni^eb^ phalāni ^b^vatthūni^eb^ kāraṇāni. ^b^Mahāgirigāmo^eb^ nāma nāgadīpapasse eko gāmova. ^b^Alabhantāpī^eb^ti appapuññatāya alābhino samānāpi. ^b^Bhikkhācāramaggasabhāga^eb^nti sabhāgaṃ tabbhāgiyaṃ bhikkhācāramaggaṃ jānanti. Anuttarimanussadhammattā therānaṃ saṃsayavinodanatthañca ^b^‘‘sāraṇīyadhammo me, bhante, pūrito’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā hi dutiyavatthusmimpi therena attā pakāsito. Daharakāle evaṃ kira sāraṇīyadhammapūrako ahosi. Manussānaṃ piyatāya sulabhapaccayatāyapi idaṃ vatthumeva. Pattagatākhīyanassa pana visesaṃ vibhāvanato ^b^‘‘idaṃ tāva…pe… ettha vatthū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Giribhaṇḍamahāpūjāyā^eb^ti cetiyagirimhi sakalalaṅkādīpe yojanappamāṇe samudde ca nāvāsaṅghāṭādike ṭhapetvā dīpapupphagandhādīhi kariyamānāya mahāpūjāya. Tassā ca paṭipattiyā avañjhabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘ete mayhaṃ pāpuṇissantī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Pariyāyenapi^eb^ lesenapi. ^b^Anucchavika^eb^nti ‘‘sāraṇīyadhammapūrako’’ti yathābhūtapavedanaṃ tumhākaṃ anucchavikanti attho.

[03]^b^Anārocetvāva palāyiṃsu^eb^ corabhayena. ‘‘Attano dujjīvikāyā’’tipi vadanti. Ahaṃ sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā, mama pattapariyāpannenapi sabbāpimā bhikkhuniyo yāpessantīti āha ^b^‘‘mā tumhe tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ cintayitthā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vaṭṭissatī^eb^ti kappissati. ^b^Therī sāraṇīyadhammapūrikā ahosi,^eb^ therassa pana sīlatejeneva devatā ussukkaṃ āpajji.

[03]Natthi etesaṃ khaṇḍanti akhaṇḍāni. Taṃ pana nesaṃ khaṇḍaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha upasampannasīlānaṃ uddesakkamena ādiantā veditabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sattasū’’^eb^tiādi. Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ ^a^M3.0094^ea^ anukkamo atthi, anupasampannasīlānaṃ samādānakkamenapi ādiantā labbhanti. ^b^Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyā^eb^ti tatrante dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya. Visadisudāharaṇañcetaṃ ‘‘akhaṇḍānī’’ti imassa adhikatattā. Evaṃ sesānampi udāharaṇāni. Khaṇḍikatā bhinnatā khaṇḍaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti ^b^khaṇḍaṃ,^eb^ sīlaṃ. ^b^Chidda^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Vemajjhe bhinnaṃ^eb^ vinivijjhanavasena. Visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. Visabhāgavaṇṇena upaḍḍhaṃ tatiyabhāgagataṃ sambhinnavaṇṇaṃ ^b^sabalaṃ,^eb^ visabhāgavaṇṇeheva bindūhi antarantarāhi vimissaṃ ^b^kammāsaṃ^eb^. Ayaṃ imesaṃ viseso. Sabalarahitāni ^b^asabalāni,^eb^ tathā ^b^akammāsāni^eb^. Sīlassa taṇhādāsabyato mocanaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ, tasmā taṇhādāsabyato mocanavacanena tesaṃ sīlānaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayatamāha. ^b^Bhujissabhāvakaraṇato^eb^ti iminā bhujissakarāni ^b^bhujissānī^eb^ti uttarapadalopenāyaṃ ^a^V3.0089^ea^ niddesoti dasseti. Yasmā vā taṃsamaṅgipuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti, tasmāpi ^b^bhujissāni^eb^. Aviññūnaṃ appamāṇatāya ^b^‘‘viññuppasatthānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Suparisuddhabhāvena vā sampannattā viññūhi pasatthānīti ^b^viññuppasatthāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā^eb^ti ‘‘imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’’ti taṇhāparāmāsena, ‘‘imināhaṃ sīlena devo hutvā tattha nicco dhuvo sassato bhavissāmī’’ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena ca aparāmaṭṭhattā. ^b^Parāmaṭṭhu^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ te sīlesu doso’’ti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena parāmaṭṭhuṃ, anuddhaṃsetuṃ codetunti attho. Sīlaṃ nāma avippaṭisārādipārampariyena yāvadeva samādhisampādanatthanti āha ^b^‘‘samādhisaṃvattanikānī’’^eb^ti. Samādhisaṃvattanappayojanāni ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikāni^eb^.

[03]Samānabhāvo sāmaññaṃ, paripuṇṇacatupārisuddhibhāvena majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya bhedābhāvato sīlena sāmaññaṃ sīlasāmaññaṃ, taṃ gato upagatoti ^b^sīlasāmaññagato^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samānabhāvūpagatasīlo’’^eb^ti, sīlasampattiyā samānabhāvaṃ upagatasīlo sabhāgavuttikoti attho. Kāmaṃ puthujjanānampi catupārisuddhisīle nānattaṃ na siyā, taṃ pana na ekantikaṃ, idaṃ ekantikaṃ niyatabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘natthi^eb^^a^M3.0095^ea^^b^maggasīle nānatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vutta^eb^nti maggasīlaṃ sandhāya taṃ ‘‘yāni tāni sīlānī’’tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Yāya^eb^nti yā ayaṃ mayhañceva tumhākañca paccakkhabhūtā. ^b^Diṭṭhī^eb^ti maggasammādiṭṭhi. ^b^Niddosā^eb^ti niddhutadosā, samucchinnarāgādipāpadhammāti attho. ^b^Niyyātī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato nissarati niggacchati. Sayaṃ niyyantīyeva hi taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato niyyāpetīti vuccati. Yā satthu anusiṭṭhi, taṃ karotīti ^b^takkaro,^eb^ tassa, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantassāti attho. ^b^Samānadiṭṭhibhāva^eb^nti sadisadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ saccasampaṭivedhena abhinnadiṭṭhibhāvaṃ.
[06]Paṭhamasāraṇīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^sabrahmacārīna^eb^nti sahadhammikānaṃ. Piyaṃ piyāyitabbakaṃ karontīti ^b^piyakaraṇā^eb^. Garuṃ garuṭṭhāniyaṃ karontīti ^b^garukaraṇā. Saṅgaṇhanatthāyā^eb^ti saṅgahavatthuvisesabhāvato sabrahmacārīnaṃ ^a^V3.0090^ea^ saṅgahaṇāya saṃvattantīti sambandho. ^b^Avivadanatthāyā^eb^ti saṅgahavatthubhāvato eva na vivadanatthāya. Sati ca avivadanahetubhūtasaṅgahakatte tesaṃ vasena sabrahmacārīnaṃ samaggabhāvo bhedābhāvo siddhoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘sāmaggiyā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Dutiyasāraṇīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^vaḍḍhitā^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitā. ^b^Punappunaṃ katā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā. ^b^Yuttayānasadisā katā^eb^ti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattirahaṃ gahitā. ^b^Vatthukatā^eb^ti vā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katā, sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesatāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Adhiṭṭhitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato ^a^M3.0096^ea^ subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya ṭhapitā. ^b^Samantato citā^eb^ti sabbabhāgena bhāvanūpacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upacitā^eb^’ti. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhā^eb^ti iddhibhāvanāsikhāppattiyā sammadeva sambhāvitā. ^b^Abhūtabyākaraṇaṃ byākarotī^eb^ti ‘‘mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā’’tiādinā attani avijjamānaguṇābhibyāhāraṃ byāharati. Cetovimuttisaddaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^‘‘nissaṭā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Puna byāpādo natthī^eb^ti idāni mama byāpādo nāma sabbaso natthīti ñatvā.

[03]^b^Balavavipassanā^eb^ti bhayatupaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ, ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ, bhaṅgañāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yesaṃ nimittānaṃ abhāvena arahattaphalasamāpattiyā animittatā, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rāgassa nimittaṃ, rāgo eva vā nimittaṃ ^b^rāganimittaṃ. Ādi^eb^-saddena dosanimittādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Rūpavedanādisaṅkhāranimittaṃ ^b^rūpanimittādi^eb^. Tesaṃyeva niccādivasena upaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^niccanimittādi^eb^. Tayidaṃ nimittaṃ yasmā sabbena sabbaṃ arahattaphale natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘sā hi…pe… animittā’’ti. Nimittaṃ anussarati anugacchati ārabbha pavattati sīlenāti ^b^nimittānusārī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vuttappabhedaṃ nimittaṃ anusaraṇasabhāva’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Asmimāno^eb^ti ‘‘asmī’’ti pavatto attavisayo māno. ^b^Ayaṃ nāma ahamasmī^eb^ti rūpalakkhaṇo ^a^V3.0091^ea^ vedanādīsu vā aññataralakkhaṇo ayaṃ nāma attā ahaṃ asmīti. Asmimāno samugghātīyati etenāti ^b^asmimānasamugghāto,^eb^ arahattamaggo. ^b^Puna asmimāno natthī^eb^ti tassa anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ kittento samugghātattameva vibhāveti.
[06]Nissāraṇīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^14-15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe āramitabbaṭṭhena vā kammaṃ ārāmo etassāti ^b^kammārāmo^eb^. Kamme rato na ganthadhure vipassanādhure vāti ^b^kammarato. Punappunaṃ yutto^eb^ti tapparabhāvena anu anu yutto pasuto. ^b^Ālāpasallāpo^eb^ti itthivaṇṇapurisavaṇṇādivasena punappunaṃ lapanaṃ. Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Bhaddakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0097^ea^ visabhāgavedanuppattiyā kakaceneva catuiriyāpathaṃ chindanto ābādhayatīti ābādho, so yassa atthīti ^b^ābādhiko^eb^. Taṃsamuṭṭhānadukkhena ^b^dukkhito. Adhimattagilāno^eb^ti dhātusaṅkhayena parikkhīṇasarīro.

[03]Sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā tiṇṇā imāyāti ^b^tiṇṇavicikicchā^eb^. Vigatā samucchinnā pavattiādīsu ‘‘evaṃ nu kho na nu kho’’ti evaṃ pavattikā kathaṃkathā assāti ^b^vigatakathaṃkathā^eb^. Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā rāgavikkhepesu sīlādiguṇesu ca tiṭṭhakattā vesārajjaṃ, visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ pattāti ^b^vesārajjappattā^eb^. Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti, nassa paro paccetabbo atthīti ^b^aparappaccayā^eb^.
[03]^b^Gilānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhāya ṭhito. Bhāvappadhāno hi ayaṃ niddeso. ^b^Gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti idaṃ pana atthamattanidassanaṃ.
[06]Nakulapitusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^a^V3.0092^ea^^b^paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti ettha ^b^paṭisallāna^eb^nti tehi tehi saddhivihārikāntevāsikaupāsakādisattehi ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi ca paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ. Kāyacittehi tato vivitto ekībhāvo pavivekoti āha ^b^‘‘ekībhāvāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ekībhāvato^eb^ti ca iminā kāyavivekato vuṭṭhānamāha. ^b^Dhammanijjhānakkhantito^eb^tiādinā cittavivekato. ^b^Vuṭṭhito^eb^ti tato duvidhavivekato bhavaṅguppattiyā sabrahmacārīhi samāgamena upeto.
[06]Soppasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0098^ea^^b^macchaghātaka^eb^nti macchabandhaṃ kevaṭṭaṃ. ^b^Orabbhikā^eb^dīsu ^b^urabbhā^eb^ vuccanti eḷakā, urabbhe hantīti ^b^orabbhiko. Sūkarikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo.
[06]Macchabandhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^evaṃnāmake gāme^eb^ti nātikānāmakaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya. Dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve gāmā, tesu ekasmiṃ gāme. Ñātīnañhi nivāsaṭṭhānabhūto gāmo ñātiko, ñātikoyeva ^b^nātiko^eb^ ña-kārassa na-kārādeso ‘‘animittā na nāyare’’tiādīsu (visuddhi. 1.174; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.20; jā. aṭṭha. 2.2.34) viya. So kira gāmo yesaṃ tadā tesaṃ pubbapurisena attano ñātīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvena nivasito, tena ñātikoti paññāyittha. Atha pacchā dvīhi dāyādehi dvidhā vibhajitvā paribhutto. Giñjakā vuccati iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhiyeva kato āvasathoti ^b^giñjakāvasatho^eb^. So hi āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato. Tasmiṃ kira padese mattikā sakkharamarumpavālukādīhi asammissā kathinā saṇhasukhumā, tāya katāni kulālabhājanānipi silāmayāni viya daḷhāni. Tasmā te upāsakā tāya mattikāya dīghaputhū ^a^V3.0093^ea^ iṭṭhakā kāretvā ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā dvāravātapānakavāṭatulāyo sabbaṃ dabbasambhārena vinā tāhi iṭṭhakāhiyeva pāsādaṃ kāresuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iṭṭhakāmaye pāsāde’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Rattindiva^eb^nti ekarattidivaṃ. ^b^Bhagavato sāsana^eb^nti ariyamaggappaṭivedhāvahaṃ satthu ovādaṃ. ^b^Bahu vata me kataṃ assā^eb^ti bahu vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya.

[03]^b^Tadantara^eb^nti tattakaṃ velaṃ. ^b^Ekapiṇḍapāta^eb^nti ekaṃ divasaṃ yāpanappahonakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ. ^b^Yāva anto paviṭṭhavāto bahi nikkhamati, bahi nikkhantavāto^eb^^a^M3.0099^ea^^b^vā anto pavisatī^eb^ti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ, taṃ nāsikāvātabhāvasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Paṭhamamaraṇassatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^nikkhante^eb^ti vītivatte. ^b^Patigatāyā^eb^ti paccāgatāya, sampattāyāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭipannāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^So mamassa antarāyo^eb^ti yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva, mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā tassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa ceva jīvitassa ca saggamokkhānañca antarāyo assa, bhaveyyāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tividho antarāyo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vipajjeyyā^eb^ti vipattiṃ gaccheyya. Satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakārakā kāye sandhibandhanacchedakavātā ^b^satthakavātā. Kattukamyatāchando^eb^ti niyyānāvaho kattukamyatākusalacchando. ^b^Payogavīriya^eb^nti bhāvanānuyogavīriyaṃ. Na paṭivāti na paṭinivattatīti ^b^appaṭivānī,^eb^ antarā vosānānāpajjanavīriyaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anukkaṇṭhanā appaṭisaṅgharaṇā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Dutiyamaraṇassatisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāraṇīyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^21-22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa ^a^V3.0094^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti ettha ^b^kevala^eb^-saddo anavasesattho, ^b^kappa^eb^-saddo samantabhāvattho. Tasmā kevalakappaṃ pokkharaṇiyanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā, ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharatīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-saddo gahito. ^b^Attano obhāsena pharitvā^eb^ti vatthālaṅkārasarīrasamuṭṭhitena obhāsena pharitvā, candimā ^a^M3.0100^ea^ viya ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho. ^b^Samanuñño^eb^ti sammadeva katamanuñño. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samānacitto’’^eb^ti, samānajjhāsayoti attho. Dukkhaṃ vaco etasminti dubbaco, tassa kammaṃ dovacassaṃ, tassa puggalassa anādariyavasena pavattā cetanā, tassa bhāvo atthitā ^b^dovacassatā^eb^. Atha vā dovacassameva ^b^dovacassatā^eb^. Sā atthato saṅkhārakkhandho hoti. Cetanāpadhāno hi saṅkhārakkhandho. Catunnaṃ vā khandhānaṃ apadakkhiṇaggāhitākārena pavattānaṃ etaṃ adhivacananti vadanti. Pāpā assaddhādayo puggalā etassa mittāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpamittatā^eb^. Sāpi atthato dovacassatā viya daṭṭhabbā. Yāya hi cetanāya puggalo pāpamitto pāpasampavaṅko nāma hoti, sā cetanā pāpamittatā. Cattāropi vā arūpino khandhā tadākārappavattā pāpamittatā. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Sāmakasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye sambhavati jātimaraṇaṃ etenāti ^b^sambhavo,^eb^ upādānanti āha ^b^‘‘jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca sambhave paccayabhūte’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anupādā^eb^ti anupādāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anupādiyitvā’’^eb^ti. Jātimaraṇāni sammā khīyanti etthāti ^b^jātimaraṇasaṅkhayo,^eb^ nibbānanti āha ^b^‘‘jātimaraṇānaṃ saṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagu^eb^nti sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā carimacittanirodhena vaṭṭadukkhalesassapi asambhavato.
[06]Bhayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^V3.0095^ea^^b^samāpattikusalo hotī^eb^ti samāpajjanakusalo hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samāpajjituṃ kusalo’’^eb^ti. Tattha antogatahetuattho ṭhiti-saddo, tasmā ṭhapanakusaloti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘samādhiṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkotīti attho’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^ṭhapetuṃ sakkotī^eb^ti sattaṭṭhāccharāmattaṃ ^a^M3.0101^ea^ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasibhāvassa nipphāditattā. ^b^Yathāparicchedenā^eb^ti yathāparicchinnakālena. ^b^Vuṭṭhātuṃ sakkoti^eb^ vuṭṭhānavasibhāvassa nipphāditattā. Kallaṃ sañjātaṃ assāti kallitaṃ, tasmiṃ kallite kallitabhāve kusalo ^b^kallitakusalo. Hāsetuṃ^eb^ tosetuṃ sampahaṃsetuṃ. ^b^Kallaṃ kātu^eb^nti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇānañca samappadhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^Samādhissa gocarakusalo^eb^ti samādhismiṃ nipphādetabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite pavattiṭṭhāne bhikkhācāragocare satisampajaññayogato kusalo cheko. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samādhissa asappāye anupakārake dhamme vajjetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ abhinīharitu^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānādisamādhiṃ visesabhāgiyatāya abhinīharituṃ upanetuṃ.
[06]Himavantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^anussatikāraṇānī^eb^ti anussatiyo eva diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādihitasukhānaṃ hetubhāvato kāraṇāni. ^b^Nikkhanta^eb^nti nissaṭaṃ. ^b^Mutta^eb^nti vissaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Vuṭṭhita^eb^nti apetaṃ. Sabbametaṃ vikkhambhanameva sandhāya vadati. ^b^Gedhamhā^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇato. ^b^Idampī^eb^ti buddhānussativasena laddhaṃ upacārajjhānamāha. ^b^Ārammaṇaṃ karitvā^eb^ti paccayaṃ karitvā, pādakaṃ katvāti attho.
[06]Anussatiṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^sambādhe^eb^ti vā taṇhāsaṃkilesādīnaṃ sampīḷe saṅkare gharāvāse. ^b^Okāsā vuccantī^eb^ti maggaphalasukhādhigamāya okāsabhāvato okāsāti vuccanti. ^b^Okāsādhigamo^eb^ti lokuttaradhammassa ^a^V3.0096^ea^ adhigamāya adhigantabbaokāso. ^b^Visujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ^a^M3.0102^ea^ ca upakkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhatthāya. Sā panāyaṃ cittassa visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anupādāya saṃvattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antotāpo antonijjhānaṃ ^b^soko,^eb^ ñātibyasanādinimittameva socikatā. ‘‘Kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 2.353-354; saṃ. ni. 2.63) paridevanavasena lapanaṃ ^b^paridevo. Samatikkamanatthāyā^eb^ti pahānāya. Āyatiṃ anuppajjanañhi idha samatikkamo. ^b^Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyā^eb^ti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhati etenāti ^b^ñāyo,^eb^ ariyamaggo. Idha pana saha pubbabhāgena ariyamaggo gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘sahavipassanakassa maggassa adhigamanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Apaccayaparinibbānassā^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānaṃ sandhāya vadati. Paccayavasena anuppannaṃ asaṅkhataṃ amatadhātumeva. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Mahākaccānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^vaḍḍhetī^eb^ti manaso vivaṭṭanissitaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ āvahati. ^b^Manobhāvanīyo^eb^ti vā manasā bhāvito sambhāvito. Yañca āvajjato manasi karoto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti. Imasmiṃ pakkhe kammasādhano sambhāvanattho bhāvanīya-saddo. ^b^‘‘Thinamiddhavinodanakammaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vatvā tadeva vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ālokasaññaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Vīriyārambhavatthuādīnaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena idha avuttānaṃ atibhojane nimittaggāhādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti atibhojane nimittaggāho, iriyāpathasamparivattanatā, ālokasaññāmanasikāro, abbhokāsavāso, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathā’’ti (itivu. aṭṭha. 111). Antarāyasaddapariyāyo idha ^b^antarā^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘anantarāyenā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Paṭhamasamayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0097^ea^^a^M3.0103^ea^ maṇḍalasaṇṭhānamāḷasaṅkhepena katā bhojanasālā ^b^maṇḍalamāḷā^eb^ti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘bhojanasālāyā’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dutiyasamayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃyeva attabhāve’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sukhavihāratthāyā^eb^ti nikkilesatāya nirāmisena sukhena vihāratthāya. ^b^Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotī^eb^ti sūriyacandapajjotamaṇiukkāvijjuādīnaṃ āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho, yathāladdhavaseneva ālokaṃ manasi karoti, citte ṭhapeti. Tathā ca naṃ manasi karoti, yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati. Yena tattha divāsaññaṃ ṭhapeti, divāriva vigatathinamiddho hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā divā tathā ratti’’^eb^nti. ^b^Divāti saññaṃ ṭhapetī^eb^ti vuttanayena manasi katvā divāriva saññaṃ uppādeti. ^b^Yathānena divā…pe… tatheva taṃ manasi karotī^eb^ti yathānena divā upaladdho sūriyāloko, evaṃ rattimpi divā diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti. ^b^Yathā canena rattiṃ…pe… manasi karotī^eb^ti yathā rattiyaṃ candāloko upaladdho, evaṃ divāpi rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti, citte ṭhapeti. ^b^Vivaṭenā^eb^ti thinamiddhena apihitattā vivaṭena. ^b^Anonaddhenā^eb^ti asañchāditena. ^b^Sahobhāsaka^eb^nti saññāṇobhāsaṃ. Dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha ñāṇadassananti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘dibbacakkhusaṅkhātassā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā^eb^ti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ. ^b^Samuggatenā^eb^ti uṭṭhitena. ^b^Dhumātattā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā sūnattā ^a^M3.0104^ea^. Setarattehi viparibhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ, purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ vinīlaṃ, vinīlameva ^b^vinīlaka^eb^nti ka-kārena padavaḍḍhanamāha anatthantarato yathā ‘‘pītakaṃ lohitaka’’nti. ^b^Paṭikūlattā^eb^ti jigucchanīyattā. Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ ^b^vinīlaka^eb^nti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.316; a. ni. 5.213). ^b^Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi^eb^ kākadhaṅkādīhi ^a^V3.0098^ea^. ^b^Vissandamānaṃ pubba^eb^nti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho. ^b^Tathābhāva^eb^nti vissandamānapubbataṃ.

[03]^b^So bhikkhū^eb^ti yo ‘‘passeyya sarīraṃ sīvathikāya chaḍḍita’’nti vutto, so bhikkhu. ^b^Upasaṃharati^eb^ sadisataṃ. ^b^Ayampi kho^eb^tiādi upasaṃharaṇākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Āyū^eb^ti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ. Arūpajīvitindriyaṃ panettha viññāṇagatikameva. ^b^Usmā^eb^ti kammajatejo. ^b^Evaṃpūtikasabhāvo^eb^ti evaṃ ativiya pūtisabhāvo āyuādivigame viyāti adhippāyo. Ediso bhavissatīti evaṃbhāvīti āha ^b^‘‘evamevaṃ uddhumātādibhedo bhavissatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Luñcitvā luñcitvā^eb^ti uppāṭetvā uppāṭetvā. ^b^Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayutta^eb^nti sabbaso akkhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ. ^b^Aññena hatthaṭṭhika^eb^nti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘catusaṭṭhibhedampī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Terovassikānī^eb^ti tirovassagatāni. Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘atikkantasaṃvaccharānī’’^eb^ti. Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvo. So yathā hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abbhokāse’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Anekadhātūna^eb^nti cakkhudhātuādīnaṃ, kāmadhātuādīnaṃ vā. ^b^Satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāyā^eb^ti ‘‘abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.214; 2.376; ma. ni. 1.109) vuttāya sattaṭṭhānikāya satiyā ceva taṃsampayuttañāṇassa ca atthāya.
[06]Udāyīsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M3.0105^ea^^b^nihīna^eb^nti lāmakaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ vā. ^b^Gāmavāsikāna^eb^nti bālānaṃ. Puthujjanānaṃ idanti ^b^pothujjanikaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanānaṃ santaka’’^eb^nti, puthujjanehi sevitabbattā tesaṃ santakanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Anariya^eb^nti na niddosaṃ. Niddosaṭṭho hi ariyaṭṭho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na uttamaṃ na parisuddha’’^eb^nti. Ariyehi vā na sevitabbanti ^b^anariyaṃ. Anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādivividhavipulānatthasahitaṃ. Tādisañca atthasannissitaṃ na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘na atthasannissita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Na vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāyā^eb^ti catusaccakammaṭṭhānābhāvato. Asati pana vaṭṭe nibbidāya virāgādīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘na virāgāyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Anuttamaṃ ^a^V3.0099^ea^^b^anuttariya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘etaṃ anuttara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Hatthismi^eb^nti nimittatthe bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘hatthinimittaṃ sikkhitabba’’^eb^nti. Hatthivisayattā hatthisannissitattā ca hatthisippaṃ ‘‘hatthī’’ti gahetvā ‘‘hatthismimpi sikkhatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā hatthisippe sikkhatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
[03]Liṅgabyattayena vibhattibyattayena ^b^pāricariye^eb^ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘pāricariyāya paccupaṭṭhitā’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Anuttariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Anuttariyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31-34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa paṭhame sekhānaṃ paṭiladdhaguṇassa parihāni nāma natthīti āha ^b^‘‘uparūpariguṇaparihānāyā’’^eb^ti, uparūpariladdhabbānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ parihānāya anuppādāyāti attho. Tatiyādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Sekhasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^M3.0106^ea^ sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajanti, sahajātāññamaññanissayasampayuttātthiavigatādipaccayavasena tāya saha ekībhāvaṃ gacchantīti ^b^vijjābhāgiyā^eb^. Atha vā vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattanti vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse pavattantīti ^b^vijjābhāgiyā^eb^. Tattha vipassanāñāṇaṃ, manomayiddhi, cha abhiññāti aṭṭha vijjā. Purimena atthena tāhi sampayuttadhammā vijjābhāgiyā. Pacchimena atthena tāsu yā kāci ekāva vijjā ^a^V3.0100^ea^ vijjā, sesā vijjābhāgiyā. Evaṃ vijjāpi vijjāya sampayuttadhammāpi ‘‘vijjābhāgiyā’’tveva veditabbā. Idha pana vipassanāñāṇasampayuttā saññāva vijjābhāgiyāti āgatā, saññāsīsena sesasampayuttadhammāpi vuttā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aniccānupassanāñāṇe^eb^ti aniccānupassanāñāṇe nissayapaccayabhūte uppannasaññā, tena sahagatāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
[06]Vijjābhāgiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^kodhano^eb^ti kujjhanasīlo. Yasmā so appahīnakodhatāya adhigatakodho nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘kodhena samannāgato’’^eb^ti āha. Upanāho etassa atthīti ^b^upanāhī,^eb^ upanayhanasīloti vā ^b^upanāhī^eb^. Vivādo nāma uppajjamāno yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena uppajjatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo’’^eb^ti. So pana yathā bahūnaṃ anatthāvaho hoti, taṃ nidassanamukhena nidassento ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Abbhantaraparisāyā^eb^ti parisabbhantare.

[03]Guṇamakkhanāya pavattopi attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantiṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkhetīti makkho, so etassa atthīti ^b^makkhī^eb^. Paḷāsatīti paḷāso, parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya apanetīti attho. So etassa atthīti ^b^paḷāsī^eb^. Paḷāsī puggalo hi dutiyassa dhuraṃ na deti, samaṃ haritvā ativadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yugaggāhalakkhaṇena paḷāsena samannāgato’’^eb^ti. Issatīti ^b^issukī^eb^. Maccharāyatīti maccharaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti ^a^M3.0107^ea^^b^maccharī^eb^. Saṭhayati na sammā bhāsatīti ^b^saṭho^eb^ aññathā santaṃ attānaṃ aññathā pavedanato. Māyā etassa atthī ^b^māyāvī^eb^. Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etassa diṭṭhīti ^b^micchādiṭṭhi,^eb^ kammapathapariyāpannāya ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādivatthukāya micchattapariyāpannāya aniyyānikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘natthikavādī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Saṃ attano diṭṭhiṃ, sayaṃ vā attanā yathāgahitaṃ parāmasati, sabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasatīti ^b^sandiṭṭhīparāmāsī^eb^. Ādhānaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti ^b^ādhānaggāhī,^eb^ daḷhaggāhī, ‘‘idameva sacca’’nti thiraggāhīti attho. Yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva laddhiṃ paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggī, dukkhena kicchena kasirena bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggaṃ kātunti ^a^V3.0101^ea^^b^duppaṭinissaggī^eb^. Yo attano uppannadiṭṭhiṃ ‘‘idameva sacca’’nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati. Tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tādiso hi puggalo yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā adhammaṃ vā suṇāti, taṃ sabbaṃ ‘‘evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyehi kathitaṃ, evaṃ amhehi suta’’nti kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahati. Yathā hi kacchapo attano hatthapādādike aṅge kenaci ghaṭite sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati, na bahi nīharati, evamayampi ‘‘na sundaro tava gāho, chaḍḍehi na’’nti vutto taṃ na vissajjati, antoyeva attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā vicarati, kumbhīlaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti. Yathā susumārā gahitaṃ na paṭinissajjanti, evaṃ gaṇhāti.
[06]Vivādamūlasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāyāti ^b^dakkhiṇā,^eb^ pariccāgamayaṃ puññaṃ, tassūpakaraṇabhūto deyyadhammo ca. Idha pana deyyadhammo adhippeto. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ito uṭṭhitenā^eb^ti ito khettato uppannena. Rāgo vinayati etenāti ^b^rāgavinayo,^eb^ rāgassa samucchedikā paṭipadā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rāgavinayapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^‘‘Pubbeva dānā sumano’’^eb^tiādigāthāya pubbeva dānā muñcacetanāya pubbe dānūpakaraṇasambharaṇato paṭṭhāya sumano ‘‘sampattīnaṃ nidānaṃ anugāmikadānaṃ ^a^M3.0108^ea^ dassāmī’’ti somanassito bhaveyya. ^b^Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādaye^eb^ti dadanto deyyadhammaṃ dakkhiṇeyyahatthe patiṭṭhāpento ‘‘asārato dhanato sārādānaṃ karomī’’ti attano cittaṃ pasādeyya. ^b^Datvā attamano hotī^eb^ti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajitvā ‘‘paṇḍitapaññattaṃ nāma mayā anuṭṭhitaṃ, aho sādhu suṭṭhū’’ti attamano pamudito pītisomanassajāto hoti. ^b^Esā^eb^ti yā ayaṃ pubbacetanā muñcacetanā aparacetanāti imāsaṃ kammaphalānaṃ saddhānugatānaṃ somanassapariggahitānaṃ tividhānaṃ cetanānaṃ pāripūrī, esā.
[03]^b^Sīlasaññamenā^eb^ti kāyikavācasikasaṃvarena. ^b^Hatthapāde^eb^ti dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ hatthapāde. ^b^Mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā^eb^ti tesaṃyeva mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā, attanāva mukhodakaṃ datvāti adhippāyo.
[06]Chaḷaṅgadānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^38-41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0102^ea^ kusalakiriyāya ādiārambhabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ ṭhitasabhāvatāya sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘ārambhadhātūti ārabhanavasena pavattavīriya’’^eb^nti. Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhe vidhamatīti āha ^b^‘‘nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhamanasabhāvaṃ vīriya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Parakkamanasabhāvo^eb^ti adhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthatāya paṭupaṭutarabhāvena paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanasabhāvo. Navamādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Attakārīsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvādasame ^b^māhaṃ nāgita yasena samāgama^eb^nti mā ahaṃ yasena samāgamanaṃ patthemi. ^b^Mā ca mayā yaso^eb^ti yaso ca mayā mā samāgacchatūti ^a^M3.0109^ea^ attho. Iminā attano lābhasakkārena anatthikataṃ vibhāveti. ^b^Pañcahi vimuttīhī^eb^ti tadaṅgavimuttiādīhi pañcahi vimuttīhi. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Nāgitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Devatāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhame ^b^parisiñcitu^eb^nti (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.272) yo cuṇṇamattikādīhi gattāni ubbaṭṭento mallakamuṭṭhādīhi vā ghaṃsanto nahāyati, so ‘‘nahāyatī’’ti vuccati. Yo tathā akatvā pakatiyāva nahāyati, so ‘‘parisiñcatī’’ti vuccati ^a^V3.0103^ea^. Bhagavato ca sarīre tathā haritabbaṃ rajojallaṃ nāma nupalimpati acchachavibhāvato, utuggahaṇatthaṃ pana bhagavā kevalaṃ udake otarati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gattāni parisiñcitu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Pubbakoṭṭhako^eb^ti pācīnakoṭṭhako. Sāvatthiyaṃ kira jetavanavihāro kadāci mahā, kadāci khuddako. Tathā hi so vipassissa bhagavato kāle yojaniko ahosi, sikhissa tigāvuto, vessabhussa aḍḍhayojaniko, kakusandhassa gāvutappamāṇo, koṇāgamanassa aḍḍhagāvutappamāṇo, kassapassa vīsatiusabhappamāṇo, amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇo jāto. Tampi nagaraṃ tassa vihārassa kadāci pācīnato hoti, kadāci dakkhiṇato, kadāci pacchimato, kadāci uttarato. Jetavanagandhakuṭiyaṃ pana catunnaṃ mañcapādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalameva. Cattāri hi acalacetiyaṭṭhānāni nāma mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ, isipatane dhammacakkappavattanaṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkassanagare devorohanakāle sopānassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ, mañcapādaṭṭhānanti. Ayaṃ pana pubbakoṭṭhako kassapadasabalassa vīsatiusabhavihārakāle pācīnadvārakoṭṭhako ahosi. So idāni ‘‘pubbakoṭṭhako’’tveva paññāyati.

[03]Kassapadasabalassa ^a^M3.0110^ea^ kāle aciravatī nagaraṃ parikkhipitvā sandamānā pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ patvā udakena bhinditvā mahantaṃ udakarahadaṃ māpesi samatittikaṃ anupubbagambhīraṃ. Tattha ekaṃ rañño nhānatitthaṃ, ekaṃ nāgarānaṃ, ekaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa, ekaṃ buddhānanti evaṃ pāṭiekkāni nhānatitthāni honti ramaṇīyānivippakiṇṇarajatapaṭṭasadisavālukāni. Iti bhagavatā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ yena ayaṃ evarūpo pubbakoṭṭhako, tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ. Athāyasmā ānando udakasāṭikaṃ upanāmesi. Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ apanetvā udakasāṭikaṃ nivāsesi. Thero dupaṭṭena saddhiṃ mahācīvaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ akāsi. Bhagavā udakaṃ otari, sahotaraṇenevassa udake macchakacchapā sabbe suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ, yantanāḷikāhi suvaṇṇarasadhārāni siñcanakālo viya suvaṇṇapaṭappasāraṇakālo viya ca ahosi. Atha bhagavato nahānavattaṃ dassetvā paccuttiṇṇassa thero surattadupaṭṭaṃ upanāmesi. Bhagavā taṃ nivāsetvā vijjullatāsadisaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā mahācīvaraṃ antantena saṃharitvā padumagabbhasadisaṃ katvā upanītaṃ dvīsu kaṇṇesu gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pubbakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Evaṃ ṭhitassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitapadumapupphasadisaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ pāricchattakaṃ, tārāmarīcivikasitañca gaganatalaṃ siriyā avahasamānaṃ viya virocittha, byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī ^a^V3.0104^ea^ cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthitvā ṭhapitā dvattiṃsa candimā viya, dvattiṃsa sūriyā viya, paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitadvattiṃsacakkavattidvattiṃsadevarājadvattiṃsamahābrahmāno viya ca ativiya virocittha. Yasmā ca bhagavato sarīraṃ sudhantacāmīkarasamānavaṇṇaṃ, suparisodhitapavāḷaruciratoraṇaṃ, suvisuddhanīlaratanāvalisadisakesatanuruhaṃ, tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ viniggatasujātajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ upari satamegharatanāvalisucchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha. Tasmiñca samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe padese ādhāvantī vidhāvantī ratanāvaliratanadāmaratanacuṇṇavippakiṇṇaṃ viya pasāritaratanacittakañcanapaṭṭamiva āsiñcamānalākhārasadhārācittamiva ukkāsatanipātasamākulamiva nirantaravippakiṇṇakaṇikārakiṅkiṇikapupphamiva vāyuvegasamuddhatacinapiṭṭhacuṇṇarañjitamiva ^a^M3.0111^ea^ indadhanuvijjullatāvitānasanthatamiva ca gaganatalaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavanañca sammā pharanti. Vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā. Evarūpesu ṭhānesu buddhānaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ vā guṇavaṇṇaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadehi vā gāthāhi vā atthañca upamāyo ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā paṭibalena dhammakathikena pūretvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Evarūpesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo. ^b^Pubbasadisāni kurumāno^eb^ti nirudakāni kurumāno, sukkhāpayamānoti attho. Sodake gatte cīvaraṃ pārupantassa hi cīvare kaṇṇikāni uṭṭhahanti, parikkhārabhaṇḍaṃ dussati, buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati, padumapatte ukkhittaudakabindu viya udakaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā gacchati. Evaṃ santepi sikkhāgāravatāya bhagavā ‘‘pabbajitavattaṃ nāmeta’’nti mahācīvaraṃ ubhosu kaṇṇesu gahetvā purato kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.

[03]Tāḷitañca vāditañca tāḷitavāditaṃ, tūriyānaṃ tāḷitavāditaṃ tūriyatāḷitavāditaṃ. Mahantañca taṃ tūriyatāḷitavāditañcāti ^b^mahātūriyatāḷitavāditaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahantenā’’^eb^tiādi. Atha vā bherimudiṅgapaṇavāditūriyānaṃ tāḷitaṃ vīṇāveḷugomukhiādīnaṃ vāditañca ^b^tūriyatāḷitavādita^eb^nti vā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Abhiññāpāraṃ gatoti ^b^abhiññāpāragū^eb^. Evaṃ sesesupi. So hi bhagavā sabbadhamme abhijānanto gatoti ^b^abhiññāpāragū^eb^. Tesu pañcupādānakkhandhe parijānanto gatoti ^b^pariññāpāragū^eb^. Sabbakilese pajahanto gatoti ^b^pahānapāragū^eb^. Cattāro magge bhāvento gatoti ^b^bhāvanāpāragū^eb^. Nirodhaṃ sacchikaronto gatoti ^b^sacchikiriyāpāragū^eb^. Sabbasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanto gatoti ^b^samāpattipāragū. Subrahmadevaputtādayo^eb^ti ettha so kira devaputto accharāsaṅghaparivuto nandanakīḷitaṃ katvā pāricchattakamūle paññattāsane nisīdi. Taṃ pañcasatā parivāretvā nisinnā ^a^V3.0105^ea^, pañcasatā rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā madhurassarena gāyitvā pupphāni pātenti. Tāni gahetvā itarā ekatovaṇṭikamālāva ganthenti. Atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakavasena ekappahāreneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Atha kāle gacchante devaputto ‘‘imāsaṃ neva saddo suyyati ^a^M3.0112^ea^, na pupphāni pātenti, kahaṃ nu kho gatā’’ti āvajjento niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā piyavatthukasokena ruppamāno cintesi – ‘‘etā tāva yathākammena gatā, mayhaṃ āyusaṅkhāro kittako’’ti. So ‘‘sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba’’nti disvā balavatarena sokena samappito. ‘‘Imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā nibbāpetuṃ samattho natthī’’ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito –
[21]‘‘Niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ cittaṃ, niccaṃ ubbiggamidaṃ mano;
[27]Anuppannesu kicchesu, atho uppatitesu ca;
[22]Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito’’ti. (saṃ. ni. 1.98) –
[07]Imaṃ gāthamabhāsi. Bhagavāpissa –
[21]‘‘Nāññatra bojjhā tapasā, nāññatrindriyasaṃvarā;
[22]Nāññatra sabbanissaggā, sotthiṃ passāmi pāṇina’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 1.98) –

[07]Dhammaṃ desesi. So desanāpariyosāne vigatasoko pañcahi accharāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dukkhappattā subrahmadevaputtādayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena candasūriyadevaputtādayo saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Catūhi kāraṇehī^eb^ti ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi.

[03]^b^Dasavidhasaṃyojanānī^eb^ti orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyabhedato dasavidhasaṃyojanāni. ^b^Sabbe accarucī^eb^ti sabbasatte atikkamitvā pavattaruci. ^b^Aṭṭhamaka^eb^nti sotāpattimaggaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Sotāpanno^eb^ti phalaṭṭho gahito.

[03]^b^Soracca^eb^nti ^a^V3.0106^ea^ ‘‘tattha katamaṃ soraccaṃ? Yo kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo, idaṃ vuccati soraccaṃ, sabbāpi sīlasaṃvaro soracca’’nti (dha. sa. 1349) vacanato sucisīlaṃ ‘‘soracca’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Karūṇā^eb^ti karuṇābrahmavihāramāha. ^b^Karuṇāpubbabhāgo^eb^ti tassa pubbabhāgaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ vadati.

[03]^b^Duvidhena^eb^^a^M3.0113^ea^^b^jhānenā^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇūpanijjhānabhedato duvidhena jhānamanena. ^b^Pañcavidhamicchājīvavasenā^eb^ti kuhanālapanānemittikatānippesikatālābhenalābhaṃnijigīsanatāsaṅkhāta- pañcavidhamicchājīvavasena. ^b^Na lippatī^eb^ti na allīyati anusayato ārammaṇakaraṇato vā taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Nāgasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^samasamagatiyā^eb^ti ka-kārassa ya-kāravasena niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘samabhāveneva samagatikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhavissantī^eb^ti atītatthe anāgatavacanaṃ katanti āha ^b^‘‘bhavissantīti jātā’’^eb^ti. Purāṇassa hi isidattassa ca samagatikaṃ sandhāya sā evamāha.
[03]^b^Ammakā^eb^ti mātugāmo. Upacāravacanañhetaṃ. Itthīsu yadidaṃ ammakā mātugāmo jananī janikāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itthī hutvā itthisaññāya eva samannāgatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhiyā paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hotī^eb^ti atthato kāraṇato ca paññāya paṭivijjhitabbaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ hoti, nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā yāthāvato aviditaṃ hoti. Samaye samaye kilesehi vimuccanakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ idha ^b^sāmāyikaṃ^eb^ ma-kāre akārassa dīghaṃ katvā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhatīti kālānukālaṃ dhammassavanaṃ nissāya pītipāmojjaṃ na labhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pamiṇantī^eb^ti ettha ārambhattho pa-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘tuletuṃ ārabhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṇīto^eb^ti visiṭṭho.

[03]^b^Tadantara^eb^nti vacanavipallāsena upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ katanti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ antaraṃ taṃ kāraṇa’’^eb^nti ^a^V3.0107^ea^. Lobhassa aparāparuppattiyā bahuvacanavasena ^b^‘‘lobhadhammā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Sīlena visesī ahosi^eb^ methunadhammaviratiyā samannāgatattā.
[06]Migasālāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45-48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M3.0114^ea^ daliddo nāma duggato, tassa bhāvo ^b^dāliddiyaṃ^eb^. Na etassa sakaṃ sāpateyyanti ^b^assako,^eb^ asāpateyyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attano santakena rahito’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Buddho dhammo saṅgho’’ti vutte ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti kenaci akampiyabhāvena okappanaṃ ratanattayaguṇe ogāhetvā kappanaṃ ^b^okappanasaddhā^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Idaṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ no sakaṃ, idaṃ pana kammaṃ saka’’nti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatajānanapaññā ^b^kammassakatapaññā^eb^. Tividhañhi duccaritaṃ attanā katampi sakakammaṃ nāma na hoti atthabhañjanato. Sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma atthajananato. ^b^Iṇādānasmi^eb^nti paccattavacanatthe etaṃ bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘iṇaggahaṇaṃ vadāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kaṭaggāho^eb^ti kataṃ sabbaso siddhameva katvā gahaṇaṃ. So pana vijayalābho hotīti āha ^b^‘‘jayaggāho’’^eb^ti. Hirimano etassāti ^b^hirimano^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘hirisampayuttacitto’’^eb^ti, pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya hiriyā sampayuttacittoti attho. Ottappati ubbijjati bhāyati sīlenāti ^b^ottappī,^eb^ ottappena samannāgato. ^b^Nirāmisaṃ sukha^eb^nti tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ dūrasamussāritakāmāmisattā. ^b^Upekkha^eb^nti catutthajjhānupekkhaṃ, na yaṃ kiñci upekkhāvedananti āha ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānupekkha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti paggahitaparipuṇṇakāyikacetasikavīriyoti attho. Yo gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭhāarambhavatthuvasena ekako hoti, tassa kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti. Cittasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasena ekako hoti. Gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, ṭhāne uppannakilesassa nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya uppannakilesassa sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, uppannaṭṭhāneyeva kilese niggaṇhāti. Ayaṃ cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ nāma hoti. Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca eko udetīti ekodi, ekaggatā. Tassa yogato ekaggacitto idha ^b^ekodi^eb^. Paṭipakkhato attānaṃ nipāti, taṃ vā nipayati visosetīti ^b^nipako^eb^. Aññataraṃ kāyādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sātisayāya satiyā saratīti ^b^sato^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekaggacitto’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Akuppā^eb^^a^V3.0108^ea^^b^me vimuttī^eb^ti mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppatāya akuppārammaṇatāya ca akuppā. Sā hi rāgādīhi na kuppatīti akuppatāyapi akuppā ^a^M3.0115^ea^. Akuppaṃ nibbānamassā ārammaṇanti akuppārammaṇatāyapi akuppā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘akuppārammaṇattā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bhavasaṃyojanāna^eb^nti kāmarāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsabhavarāgaissāmacchariya- avijjāsaṅkhātānaṃ dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ. Imāni hi satte bhavesu saṃyojenti upanibandhanti bhavābhavena saṃyojenti, tasmā bhavasaṃyojanānīti vuccanti. ^b^Khīṇāsavo uttamāṇaṇo^eb^ kilesaiṇānaṃ abhāvato. Aññe hi sattā yāva na kilesā pahīyanti, tāva saiṇā nāma aserivihārabhāvato. Catutthādīni uttānatthāni.
[06]Iṇasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^vutthabrahmacariyavāso^eb^ti nivutthabrahmacariyavāso. ^b^Katakaraṇīyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^karaṇīya^eb^nti pariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyamāha. Taṃ pana yasmā catūhi maggehi paccekaṃ catūsu saccesu kattabbattā soḷasavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūhi maggehi kattabba’’^eb^nti. Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātā tayo osīdāpanaṭṭhena bhārā viyāti bhārā. Te ohitā oropitā nikkhittā pātitā etenāti ^b^ohitabhāro^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhabhāraṃ…pe… otāretvā ṭhito’’^eb^ti. Anuppatto sadatthanti ^b^anuppattasadattho. Sadattho^eb^ti ca sakatthamāha ka-kārassa da-kāraṃ katvā. Ettha hi arahattaṃ attano yonisomanasikārāyattattā attūpanibandhaṭṭhena sasantānapariyāpannattā attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena attano uttamatthena ca attano atthattā ‘‘sakattho’’ti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sadattho vuccati arahatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sammadaññā vimutto^eb^ti sammā aññāya vimutto, acchinnabhūtāya maggapaññāya sammā yathābhūtaṃ dukkhādīsu yo yathā jānitabbo, tathā jānitvā vimuttoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sammā hetunā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vimutto^eb^ti ca dve vimuttiyo sabbassa cittasaṃkilesassa maggo nibbānādhimutti ca. Nibbāne adhimuccanaṃ tattha ninnapoṇapabbhāratāya. Arahā sabbakilesehi vimuttacittattā cittavimuttiyā vimutto. Nibbānaṃ adhimuttattā nibbāne vimutto. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Khemasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0109^ea^^a^M3.0116^ea^ upanisīdati phalaṃ etthāti kāraṇaṃ ^b^upanisā. Yathābhūtañāṇadassana^eb^nti yathāsabhāvajānanasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ. Etena taruṇavipassanaṃ dasseti. Taruṇavipassanā hi balavavipassanāya paccayo hoti. ^b^Taruṇavipassanā^eb^ti nāmarūpapariggahe ñāṇaṃ, paccayapariggahe ñāṇaṃ, sammasane ñāṇaṃ, maggāmagge vavatthapetvā ṭhitañāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Nibbindati etāyāti ^b^nibbidā. Balavavipassanā^eb^ti bhayatupaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paṭisaṅkhānupassanā pana muccitukamyatāpakkhikā eva. ‘‘Yāva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, tāva taruṇavipassanā’’ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato balavavipassanā. Virajjati ariyo saṅkhārato etenāti ^b^virāgo,^eb^ ariyamaggo. ^b^Arahattaphala^eb^nti ukkaṭṭhaniddesato vuttaṃ. Indriyasaṃvarassa sīlarakkhaṇahetuttā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sīlānurakkhaṇaindriyasaṃvaro kathito’’^eb^ti.
[06]Indriyasaṃvarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā^eb^tiādipāḷipadesu imināva nayena attho daṭṭhabbo – sīlādiguṇānaṃ thirabhāvappattiyā ^b^therā^eb^. Suttageyyādi bahu sutaṃ etesanti ^b^bahussutā^eb^. Vācuggatadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti ^b^āgatāgamā^eb^. Suttātidhammasaṅkhātassa dhammassa dhāraṇena ^b^dhammadharā^eb^. Vinayadhāraṇena ^b^vinayadharā^eb^. Tesaṃyeva dhammavinayānaṃ mātikāya dhāraṇena ^b^mātikādharā^eb^. Tattha tattha dhammaparipucchāya ^b^paripucchati^eb^. Taṃ atthaparipucchāya ^b^paripañhati^eb^ vīmaṃsati vicāreti. ^b^Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ, imassa kvattho^eb^ti paripucchanapañhanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Āvivaṭañceva^eb^ pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato ^b^vivaranti. Anuttānīkatañca^eb^ yuttivibhāvanena ^b^uttānīkaronti. Kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu^eb^ saṃsayuppattiyā ^a^M3.0117^ea^ hetuyā gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷipadesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena ^b^kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti^eb^.
[06]Ānandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^V3.0110^ea^ bhoge adhippāyo etesanti ^b^bhogādhippāyā^eb^. Paññatthāya etesaṃ mano upavicaratīti ^b^paññūpavicārā^eb^. Pathaviyā dāyatthāya vā cittaṃ abhiniveso etesanti ^b^pathavībhinivesā^eb^. Mantā adhiṭṭhānaṃ patiṭṭhā etesanti ^b^mantādhiṭṭhānā^eb^. Iminā nayena sesapadānipi veditabbāni. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Khattiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasame ^b^jaṅgalāna^eb^nti ettha yo nipicchalo na anūpo nirudakatāya thaddhalūkho bhūmippadeso, so ‘‘jaṅgalo’’ti vuccati. Tabbahulatāya pana idha sabbo bhūmippadeso jaṅgalo. Tasmiṃ jaṅgale jātā bhavāti vā jaṅgalā, tesaṃ ^b^jaṅgalānaṃ^eb^. Evañhi nadicarānampi hatthīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti samodhātabbānaṃ viya samodhāyakānampi idha jaṅgalaggahaṇena gahetabbato. ^b^Pathavītalacārīna^eb^nti iminā jalacārino ca nivatteti adissamānapādattā. ^b^‘‘Pāṇāna’’^eb^nti sādhāraṇavacanampi ^b^‘‘padajātānī’’^eb^ti saddantarasannidhānena visesaniviṭṭhameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sapādakapāṇāna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Muttagata’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.119; a. ni. 9.11) gata-saddo viya idha ^b^jāta^eb^-saddo anatthantaroti āha ^b^‘‘padajātānīti padānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samodhāna^eb^nti samavarodhaṃ, antogadhaṃ vā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘odhānaṃ upanikkhepaṃ gacchantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kūṭaṅgamā^eb^ti pārimantena kūṭaṃ upagacchanti. ^b^Kūṭaninnā^eb^ti kūṭacchiddamagge pavisanavasena kūṭe ninnā. ^b^Kūṭasamosaraṇā^eb^ti chidde anupavisanavasena ca āhacca avatthānena ca kūṭe samodahitvā ṭhitā. Vaṇṭe ^a^M3.0118^ea^ patamāne sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ patantīti āha ^b^‘‘vaṇṭānuvattakāni bhavantī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Appamādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvādasame ^b^jātibhūmiya^eb^nti ettha jananaṃ jāti, jātiyā bhūmi ^b^jātibhūmi,^eb^ jātaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ kho panetaṃ neva kosalamahārājādīnaṃ, na caṅkibrāhmaṇādīnaṃ, na sakkasuyāmasantusitādīnaṃ ^a^V3.0111^ea^, na asītimahāsāvakānaṃ, na aññesaṃ sattānaṃ ‘‘jātibhūmī’’ti vuccati. Yassa pana jātadivase dasasahassī lokadhātu ekaddhajamālāvippakiṇṇakusumavāsacuṇṇagaṇasugandhā sabbapāliphullamiva nandanavanaṃ virocamānā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya akampittha, jaccandhādīnañca rūpadassanādīni anekāni pāṭihāriyāni pavattiṃsu. Tassa sabbaññubodhisattassa jātaṭṭhānaṃ, sātisayassa pana janakakapilavatthusannissayo ‘‘jātibhūmī’’ti vuccati. ^b^Jātibhūmakā upāsakā^eb^ti jātibhūmivāsino upāsakā. Santanetvā sabbaso tanetvā pattharitvā ṭhitamūlāni ^b^mūlasantānakāni^eb^. Tāni pana atthato mūlāniyevāti āha ^b^‘‘mūlasantānakānanti mūlāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]Jātadivase āvudhānaṃ jotitattā, rañño aparimitassa ca sattakāyassa anatthato paripālanasamatthatāya ca ‘‘jotipālo’’ti laddhanāmattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nāmena jotipālo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Govindo^eb^ti govindiyābhisekena abhisitto, govindassa ṭhāne ṭhapanābhisekena abhisittoti attho. Taṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa kulaparamparāgataṃ ṭhānantaraṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ṭhānena mahāgovindo’’^eb^ti. Gavaṃ paññañca vindati paṭilabhatīti govindo, mahanto govindoti ^b^mahāgovindo. Go^eb^ti hi paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ ‘‘gacchati atthe bujjhatī’’ti katvā. Mahāgovindo ca amhākaṃ bodhisattoyeva. So kira disampatissa nāma rañño purohitassa govindabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā attano pitussa ca rañño ca accayena tassa putto reṇu, sahāyā ^a^M3.0119^ea^ cassa sattabhū, brahmadatto, vessabhū, bharato, dve dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta rājāno yathā aññamaññaṃ na vivadanti. Evaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ atthadhamme anusāsante jambudīpatale sabbesaṃ rājāva raññaṃ, brahmāva brāhmaṇānaṃ, devova gahapatikānaṃ sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘reṇuādīnaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ purohito’’^eb^ti. Imeva satta bhāradhārā mahārājāno. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Sattabhū brahmadatto ca, vessabhū bharato saha;
[22]Reṇu dve ca dhataraṭṭhā, tadāsuṃ satta bhāradhā’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.308);

[03]Rañño diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthānaṃ puro vidhānato pure saṃvidhānato ^b^purohito. Kodhāmagandhenā^eb^ti kodhasaṅkhātena pūtigandhena. Karuṇā assa atthīti ^b^karuṇa^eb^nti sapubbabhāgakaruṇajjhānaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘karuṇāya ca karuṇāpubbabhāge ca ṭhitā’’^eb^ti. Yakāro sandhivasena āgatoti āha ^b^‘‘yeteti ete’’^eb^ti. ^b^Arahattato paṭṭhāya sattamo^eb^ti sakadāgāmī. ^b^Sakadāgāmiṃ^eb^^a^V3.0112^ea^^b^upādāyā^eb^ti sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭicca. Sakadāgāmissa hi pañcindriyāni sakadāgāmibhāvaṃ paṭicca mudūni nāma honti. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dhammikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dhammikavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhassa ^a^V3.0113^ea^^a^M3.0120^ea^ paṭhame ^b^nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane^eb^ti ettha kiṃ taṃ āsanaṃ paṭhamameva paññattaṃ, udāhu bhagavantaṃ disvā paññattanti ce? Bhagavato dharamānakāle padhānikabhikkhūnaṃ vattametaṃ, yadidaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhāsanaṃ paññapetvāva nisīdananti dassento āha ^b^‘‘padhānikabhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi. Buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati, sabbattha buddhāsanaṃ paññattameva hoti. Kasmā? Bhagavā hi attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti – ‘‘asuko mayhaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gato, asakkhi nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ, no’’ti. Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ, tato ‘‘kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā adhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī’’ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati. Athevaṃ ovadiyamānā te bhikkhū cintayiṃsu ‘‘satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe, ‘bhante, idha nisīdatha nisīdathā’ti āsanapariyesanaṃ nāma bhāro’’ti. Te āsanaṃ paññapetvāva viharanti. Yassa pīṭhaṃ atthi, so taṃ paññapeti. Yassa natthi, so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālikāpuñjaṃ vā paññapeti. Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṃkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.

[03]^b^Satta sarā^eb^ti – chajjo, usabho, gandhāro, majjhimo, pañcamo, dhevato, nisādoti ete satta sarā. ^b^Tayo gāmā^eb^ti – chajjagāmo, majjhimagāmo, sādhāraṇagāmoti tayo gāmā, samūhāti attho. Manussaloke vīṇāvādanā ekekassa sarassa vasena tayo tayo mucchanāti katvā ^b^ekavīsati mucchanā^eb^. Devaloke vīṇāvādanā pana samapaññāsa mucchanāti vadanti. Tattha hi ^a^V3.0114^ea^ ekekassa sarassa vasena satta ^a^M3.0121^ea^ satta mucchanā, antarassa sarassa ca ekāti samapaññāsa mucchanā. Teneva ^b^sakkapañhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.345) ‘‘samapaññāsa mucchanā mucchetvā’’ti pañcasikhassa vīṇāvādanaṃ dassentena vuttaṃ. ^b^Ṭhānā ekūnapaññāsā^eb^ti ekekasseva sarassa satta satta ṭhānabhedā, yato sarassa maṇḍalatāvavatthānaṃ hoti. Ekūnapaññāsaṭṭhānaviseso tisso duve catasso catasso tisso duve catassoti dvāvīsati sutibhedā ca icchitā.

[03]^b^Atigāḷhaṃ āraddha^eb^nti thinamiddhachambhitattānaṃ vūpasamatthaṃ ativiya āraddhaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^. Sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena atthetabbā ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^. Samathoyeva ^b^samathanimittaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ sesesupi. ^b^Khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā^eb^ti ettha yasmā bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo na khayā rāgassa vītarāgo sabbaso avippahīnarāgattā. Vikkhambhitarāgo hi so. Arahā pana khayā eva, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā’’ti. Esa nayo dosamohesupi.

[03]^b^Lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno^eb^ti ettha labbhati pāpuṇīyatīti ^b^lābho,^eb^ catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sakkaccaṃ kātabboti ^b^sakkāro^eb^. Paccayā eva hi paṇītapaṇītā sundarasundarā abhisaṅkharitvā katā ‘‘sakkāro’’ti vuccati, yā ca parehi attano gāravakiriyā, pupphādīhi vā pūjā. ^b^Siloko^eb^ti vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. Taṃ lābhañca, sakkārañca, silokañca, nikāmayamāno, pavattayamānoti attho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘catupaccayalābhañca…pe… patthayamāno’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Thūṇa^eb^nti pasūnaṃ bandhanatthāya nikhātatthambhasaṅkhātaṃ thūṇaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Soṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^samadhosī^eb^ti samantato adhosi. Sabbabhāgena pariphandanacalanākārena apacitiṃ dasseti. Vattaṃ kiretaṃ bāḷhagilānenapi vuḍḍhataraṃ ^a^M3.0122^ea^ disvā uṭṭhitākārena apaciti dassetabbā. Tena pana ‘‘mā cali mā calī’’ti vattabbo, taṃ pana calanaṃ uṭṭhānākāradassanaṃ hotīti ^a^V3.0115^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘uṭṭhānākāraṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Santimāni āsanānī^eb^ti paṭhamameva paññatthāsanaṃ sandhāya vadati. Buddhakālasmiñhi ekassapi bhikkhuno vasanaṭṭhāne – ‘‘sace satthā āgacchissati, āsanaṃ paññattameva hotū’’ti antamaso phalakamattampi paṇṇasanthāramattampi paññattameva. ^b^Khamanīyaṃ yāpanīya^eb^nti kacci dukkhaṃ khamituṃ, iriyāpathaṃ vā yāpetuṃ sakkāti pucchati. ^b^Sīsavedanā^eb^ti kutoci nikkhamituṃ alabhamānehi vātehi samuṭṭhāpitā balavatiyo sīsavedanā honti.
[06]Phaggunasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^abhijātiyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^abhi^eb^-saddo upasaggamattaṃ, na atthavisesajotakoti āha ^b^‘‘cha jātiyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhijāyatī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Urabbhe^eb^ hanantīti ^b^orabbhikā^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^sūkarikā^eb^dayo veditabbā. ^b^Rode^eb^nti kururakammantatāya sappaṭibaddhe satte assūni mocentīti ruddā, te eva ^b^luddā^eb^ ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā. Iminā aññepi ye keci māgavikā nesādā vuttā, te pāpakammappasutatāya ^b^‘‘kaṇhābhijātī’’^eb^ti vadati.

[03]^b^Bhikkhū^eb^ti ca buddhasāsane bhikkhū. Te kira sacchandarāgena paribhuñjantīti adhippāyena catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantīti ‘‘kaṇṭakavuttikā’’ti vadati. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā te paṇīte paccaye paṭisevantīti tassa micchāgāho. Ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomaggāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadatīti. Atha vā ^b^kaṇṭakavuttikā^eb^ evaṃnāmakā eke pabbajitā, ye savisesaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuttā. Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti ‘‘kaṇṭakavuttikā’’ti vuttā. Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kaṇṭakavuttikāti samaṇā nāmete’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Lohitābhijāti^eb^^a^M3.0123^ea^ nāma nigaṇṭhā ekasāṭakāti vuttā. Te kira ṭhatvā bhuñjananahānappaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena purimehi dvīhi paṇḍaratarā.

[03]^b^Acelakasāvakā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0116^ea^ ājīvakasāvake vadati. Te kira ājīvakaladdhiyā suvisuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā. Evañca katvā attano paccayadāyake nigaṇṭhehipi jeṭṭhakatare karoti.

[03]Ājīvakā ājīvakiniyo ^b^‘‘sukkābhijātī’’^eb^ti vuttā. Te kira purimehi catūhi paṇḍaratarā. Nandādayo hi tathārūpaṃ ājīvakappaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā, tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarāti ^b^‘‘paramasukkābhijātī’’^eb^ti vuttā.

[03]^b^Bilaṃ olaggeyyu^eb^nti maṃsabhāgaṃ nhārunā vā kenaci vā ganthitvā purisassa hatthe vā kese vā olambanavasena bandheyyuṃ. Iminā satthadhammaṃ nāma dasseti. Satthavāho kira mahākantāraṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge goṇe mate maṃsaṃ gahetvā sabbesaṃ satthikānaṃ ‘‘idaṃ khāditvā ettakaṃ mūlaṃ dātabba’’nti koṭṭhāsaṃ olambati. Goṇamaṃsaṃ nāma khādantāpi atthi, akhādantāpi atthi, khādantāpi mūlaṃ dātuṃ sakkontāpi asakkontāpi. Satthavāho yena mūlena goṇo gahito, taṃ mūlaṃ satthikehi dhāraṇatthaṃ sabbesaṃ balakkārena koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā mūlaṃ gaṇhāti. Ayaṃ satthadhammo.

[03]^b^Kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno^eb^ti kaṇhe nīcakule jāto hutvā. ^b^Kaṇhadhamma^eb^nti paccatte upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘kaṇhasabhāvo hutvā abhijāyatī’’^eb^ti, taṃ antogadhahetuatthaṃ padaṃ, uppādetīti attho. Tasmā ^b^kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatī^eb^ti kāḷakaṃ dasadussīlyadhammaṃ uppādeti. ^b^Sukkaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatī^eb^ti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. So hi ‘‘ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīcakule nibbatto, idāni puññaṃ karissāmī’’ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ paṇḍaradhammaṃ karoti.

[03]^b^Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbāna^eb^nti sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya yathā dasavidhaṃ dussīlyadhammaṃ. Sace sukkaṃ, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya yathā dānasīlādikusalakammaṃ. Dvinnampi appadānato ‘‘akaṇhaṃ asukka’’nti vuttaṃ. Nibbānañca nāma imasmiṃ atthe arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ ‘‘abhijāyatī’’ti vacanato ^a^M3.0124^ea^. Tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma yathā ‘‘rāgādīnaṃ khayante jātattā rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo’’ti. Paṭippassambhanavasena vā kilesānaṃ nibbāpanato nibbānaṃ. Taṃ esa abhijāyati pasavati. Idhāpi hi antogadhahetu atthaṃ ‘‘jāyatī’’ti padaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘jāyatī’’ti imassa pāpuṇātīhi atthaṃ ^a^V3.0117^ea^ gahetvāva ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sukkābhijātiyo samāno^eb^ti sukke uccakule jāto hutvā. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Chaḷabhijātisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^saṃvarenā^eb^ti saṃvarena hetubhūtena vā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti ayaṃ idha-saddo sabbākārato indiyasaṃvarasaṃvutassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpano, aññassa tathābhāvappaṭisedhano vāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idhāti idhasmiṃ sāsane’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhāya. ^b^Saṅkhā^eb^-saddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanādīsu dissati ‘‘saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.168) hi ñāṇe dissati. ‘‘Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.202, 204) koṭṭhāse. ‘‘Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 1313-1315) paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’’ntiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 2.128) gaṇanāya. Idha pana ñāṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘paṭisañjānitvā paccavekkhitvāti attho’’^eb^ti. Ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇā ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti yojanā. ^b^Sampalimaṭṭha^eb^nti ghaṃsitaṃ. ^b^Anubyañjanaso^eb^ti hatthapādasitāalokitavilokitādippakārabhāgaso. Tañhi ayonisomanasikaroto kilesānaṃ anubyañjanato ‘‘anubyañjana’’nti vuccati. ^b^Nimittaggāho^eb^ti itthipurisanimittassa subhanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa nimittassa gāho. ^b^Ādittapariyāyenā^eb^ti ^b^ādittapariyāye^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 4.28; mahāva. 54) āgatanayena veditabbo.

[03]Yathā itthiyā indriyaṃ itthindriyaṃ, na evamidaṃ, idaṃ pana cakkhumeva indriyanti ^b^cakkhundriyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cakkhumeva indriya’’^eb^nti.
